text:
On the final day of the event to revitalize Enoshima,
"Local Heroes Assemble in Enoshima"â€”

[Player] had an appointment with a certain person
on Enoshima Beach at night.

name: Saotome
text:
[Player]-kun!
Sorry for making you wait!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's good then!
I don't want you to think of me as "the old man who's always late"!
Saotome said that, and wore a relieved expression.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: Just now, I was cleaning the beach and preparing the fireworks, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: While I was moving around, my body got warm, and I couldn't stop sweating!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...C-Could it be that this is too casual!?

Saotome said in a loud voice,
and scratched his cheek in embarrassment.

text:
And, while walking along the beach with [Player],
he began to speak thoughtfully.

name: Saotome
text:
Even now, it feels unbelievable.
To think I, this old man, would become a local hero
and be active...

name: Saotome
text:
Yuto is happy that I became a hero,
but I also feel a little embarrassed.

name: Saotome
text:
After all, I'm just an old man like this, right?
I thought my body was a bit too flabby
to call myself a cool local hero.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-Is that so...?
[Player]-kun, you have quite the unusual tastes, huh...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
However, your praise is certainly welcome.
Thank you, [Player]-kun.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, thank you.
Since you praised me, I cannot afford to fight in an uncool way!

options.text: Time for body training towards your ideal self!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Th-That's right!
I'll have to ask Astar-kun how to get in shape...!

text:
Saotome said that, and
spoke to [Player] in a more formal tone.

name: Saotome
text:
I've lived quite a long time, but
you never know what's going to happen in life.

name: Saotome
text:
I was worried about what would happen,
but now that tourists are visiting
Enoshima like this...

name: Saotome
text:
[Player]-kun, it's all thanks
to you and the heroes
working hard for Enoshima.

name: Saotome
text:
For everything,
thank you, truly.

options.text: The project concept was good too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
Yuto's love for heroes is deeply ingrained in himself, you know.
Saotome smiled a little proudly, and looked out at the beach again.

name: Saotome
text:
If you really meant it,
I'd feel like my efforts so far
were worth it.

name: Saotome
text:
However, if I had tried to carry everything out by myself,
things probably wouldn't have gone well.

name: Saotome
text:
It's precisely because you and
all the local heroes cooperated wholeheartedly
that we received such a response.

name: Saotome
text:
That is...
What I believe to be true.

options.text: We all worked hard together, didn't we?
I'm glad we were able to get good results.

text:
On Enoshima Beach,
besides the islanders and children,
there were also a few scattered figures.

Among them,
there were also tourists wearing
"Shinyasu-kun" T-shirts.

Saotome, seeing that, smiled contentedly, then
pointed to a quiet part of the beach with few people.

name: Saotome
text:
...It's almost time for the fireworks.
Let's sit over there
and watch them together.

Saotome took out a plain handkerchief
from his pocket and spread it
behind [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
I didn't do anything special, but I'll say "You're welcome" then.

options.text: Y-You don't have to go that far...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, no, don't worry about it.
That's just something I wanted to do.

text:
The two sat side by side, looking up at the fireworks.
Illuminated by the colorful lights,
Saotome slowly began to speak.

name: Saotome
text:
...On the final day of the event,
Shiratori-kun was the one who planned
to launch fireworks on the beach.

name: Saotome
text:
We arranged the fireworks together,
calculated the safe distance from the flight distance,
and went through various application procedures, and then...

name: Saotome
text:
If I could watch these beautiful fireworks
with [Player]-kun, Shiratori-kun, and everyone...

After saying that much,
Saotome wiped his eyes
with the back of his hand.

name: Saotome
text:
No, really~.
As you get older, your tear
ducts get loose, don't they?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you...
[Player]-kun, you're truly kind...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Sorry.
I ended up damping the mood.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's the final day of the event, and so, I can't be making a face like this.
After all, I'm a hero now.

text:
[Player] paused there, and
nodded strongly towards Saotome.

options.text: Saotome-san, you said so too, didn't you?

name: Saotome
text:
...That's right, [Player]-kun.
The fireworks rising over Enoshima
Beach are not the last ones.

name: Saotome
text:
I will protect Enoshima,
and gradually revitalize it,
and someday...

name: Saotome
text:
I want to see even bigger fireworks
with you, [Player]-kun, the heroes,
and Shiratori-kun.

name: Saotome
text:
I will believe that day will come,
and continue to protect Enoshima.
As "Enoshiman No. 2".

options.text: I think it's a wonderful dream!
You can always rely on me, Saotome-san.

name: Saotome
text:
Hah-hah-hah...
[Player]-kun, you always say
such reassuring things.

name: Saotome
text:
To have you observe my dream,
and fight beside me...
It was truly reassuring.

name: Saotome
text:
I've completely
taken a liking to you.

name: Saotome
text:
So [Player]-kun.
Please do come visit Enoshima again.
Next time, just as a guest!

options.text: I'll bring my friends next time!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ohh!
That's a welcoming offer!
Please do!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: When you invite your friends, it would be helpful if you could spread the word about Shinyasu-kun and whitebait soft serve!
Immediately after Saotome's lighthearted remark, the two's joyful laughter echoed across the beach.

options.text: I'll come to see you, Saotome-san.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What...!?
[Player]-kun, you're coming to see me...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: You're going to come see me, this old man, again...?

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 2]

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: To think I'd be told such a thing by a youngster like you, [Player]-kun...
A blushing Saotome, though a bit flustered, returned [Player]'s hand-squeeze.
A gentle warmth spread from Saotome's thick palm to [Player]'s.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: To think I'd be told such a thing by a youngster like you, [Player]-kun...
A blushing Saotome, though a bit flustered, returned [Player]'s hand-squeeze.
A gentle warmth spread from Saotome's thick palm to [Player]'s.

name: Saotome
text:
Thank you, [Player]-kun.
I will never forget this day.

name: Saotome
text:
With this warm memory,
I can stand up in any pinch.
...That's what I believe.

name: Saotome
text:
Just like the local heroes
who saved Enoshima, this old man
will also do his best as a rookie hero!

Saotome's profile, as he declared that,
was filled with the resolve of a hero.

And the two, gazing at the fireworks,
talked endlessly about their memories and future.
